greywrap.description_1: We work with the lastest and best technology for the web. HTML5, Javascript and Ruby are our tools to make magic.
greywrap.description_2: When we start new proyects we design them to fit in the diferents devices and browser. That way you can reach many more people.
greywrap.description_3: We love to make the simples and beatiful solutions for your project. This an art, because we take care the whole without sacrifice the details.

about.about_description_1: We believe ideas come from everyone, everywhere. In fact, at BlackTie, everyone within our agency walls is a designer in their own right. And there are a few principles we believe—and we believe everyone should believe—about our design craft. These truths drive us, motivate us, and ultimately help us redefine the power of design. We’re big believers in doing right by our neighbors. After all, we grew up in the Twin Cities and we believe this place has much to offer. So we do what we can to support the community we love.
about.about_description_2: Over the past four years, we’ve provided more than $1 million in combined cash and pro bono support to Way to Grow, an early childhood education and nonprofit organization. Other community giving involvement throughout our agency history includes pro bono work for more than 13 organizations, direct giving, a scholarship program through the Minneapolis College of Art & Design, board memberships, and ongoing participation in the Keystone Club, which gives five percent of our company’s earnings back to the community each year.

divider_1.divider_description: To achieve real change, we have to expand boundaries. Because the Wild West of what-could-be is unexplored but rife with opportunity.

portfolio.title: WE CREATE COOL STUFF
portfolio.description_1: Cliente Especial is a very simple service created to work in the cloud for small companies to create, manage and print tax retentions documents.
portfolio.description_2: Pymenta is a very simple Cloud ERP System designed to work in the cloud and allow small companies to create, manage and print documents ( invoices, notes, quotations, credits, etc). You can manage warehouses, providers, clients, products and stock.
portfolio.description_3: Volunteer System for The Turtle Foundation. With this system volunteers can register, join project and print works reports.
